text: Ahmed Mohamed Gulaid () aka Ahmed Jimaleh was the first chairman of Somali National Movement (SNM). ==Somali National Movement (SNM)== Ahmed Mohamed Gulaid was the first to be elected as chairman of the SNM organization in October 1981. After a political conflict in SNM, Ahmed Mohamed Gulaid resign from the position as chairman in January 1982. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:1992 deaths Category:20th-century Somalian people Category:Chairmen of SNM Category:Somali National Movement Category:Somalian politicians
title: Ahmed Mohamed Gulaid
